name.baseName: Non-thick oil ; Low permeability oil field 80%~90% ; Secondary oil recovery + tertiary oil recovery ; All sizes; NESPS2
非稠油 ; 低渗透油田80%~90% ; 二次采油+三次采油 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisFilter separation/floating separation + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management39

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisFilter separation/floating separation + bio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management39
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了石油提取行业中用于处理化学需氧量、氨氮、有机态氮和苯酚以及与石油相关废物的各种尾端处理技术。这些技术实施于低渗透非稠油油田的二次和三次采油过程，并适用于所有规模的作业。治理方法包括设计用于启动二次和三次油田回采的物理、化学和生物处理流程以及注入技术。具体描述的技术有过滤分离、浮选分离、生物接触氧化、化学混凝、A2/O工艺、SBR工艺、A/O工艺、倾斜板油水分离器、气浮法、水力旋流器以及各种过滤系统。每项技术的技术效率都有提供，表示预期的污染物减少水平。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码07文件，在完整版文件中第51页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为非稠油，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisFilter separation/floating separation + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year)).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 7.27A/(1-A)。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 7.27A/(1-A). Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是过滤分离/上浮分离+A/O工艺，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 7.27A/(1-A)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

污染物指标挥发酚的末端治理技术是物理+回注，其效率为100，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为挥发酚，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 0.82A/(1-A)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year)).The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as A/(1-A)。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as A/(1-A). Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 A/(1-A)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是过滤分离/上浮分离+生物接触氧化法，其效率为39，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施年运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 7.27A/(1-A)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
